title: Roaring Twenties Lingo
description: Get the lowdown on the snappy language of the 1920s party scene and social life

questions.question: In the Roaring Twenties, what did 'the cat's pajamas' mean?
What was a 'gold digger' in 1920s slang?
options: A person who pursued relationships for money

questions.question: In 1920s lingo, what did 'the real McCoy' mean?
options: The genuine article, the real thing

questions.question: What did 'cash or check' mean in 1920s slang?
options: A question meaning 'do you want a kiss now or later?'

questions.question: In the 1920s, what was a 'ritzy' place?
options: An elegant, luxurious, or high-class establishment

questions.question: What did 'giggle water' mean in Roaring Twenties slang?
What did 'hip to the jive' mean in 1920s slang?
options: In the know, aware of what's going on

questions.question: In the Roaring Twenties, what was a 'hayburner'?
options: A gas-guzzling car or a horse that ate too much

questions.question: What did 'putting on the Ritz' mean in 1920s culture?
options: Doing something in a lavishly stylish manner

questions.question: What did 'spiffy' mean in Roaring Twenties language?
In the 1920s, what did 'neck' mean as a verb?
What was a 'struggle buggy' in 1920s slang?
options: The back seat of a car used for romantic encounters

questions.question: In Roaring Twenties lingo, what did 'dapper' describe?
options: A neat, trim, and stylishly dressed person
